item.title: LeetCode 128. Longest Consecutive Sequence
item.description: time: O(N) / space: O(N) class Solution: def longestConsecutive(self, nums: List[int]) -> int: d = dict() if not nums: return 0 for num in nums: if num in d: continue l,r = num-1, num+1 left_value = d.get(l, 0) right_value = d.get(r, 0) d[num] = left_value + right_value + 1 d[num-left_value] = d[num] d[num+right_value] = d[num] return max(d.values()) 양 옆 끝의 값을 업데이트 하면서 진행
